scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Glasgow writes to Hansen of The New York World-Telegramconcerning favorable reviews of her books by Hansen, Thyra Samter Winslow, and Heywood Broun. Rollin Kirby cartoons and Jessie Conrad's biography of Joseph Conrad are mentioned.

did.unittitle: Ellen Glasgow, Richmond, Virginia, to Harry Hansen (1884-1977) of The New York World-Telgram 1931 May 23

scopecontent.p: Concerning a review of her book [ The Sheltered Life] and mentioning the Old World Cartoonsof [Rollin] Kirby (1875-1952)

did.unittitle: Ellen Glasgow to Harry Hansen 1935 Sep 14

scopecontent.p: Concerning a review of her book [ Vein of Iron] by Mrs. [Thyra Samter] Winslow (1903-1961) and [Heywood Campbell] Broun (1888-1939), and mentioning a book [ Joseph Conrad and his Circle] by the widow of [Joseph] Conrad (1857-1924), [Jessie George Conrad].

did.unittitle: Ellen Glasgow to Harry Hansen 1941 Mar 31

scopecontent.p: Thanking him for the good review of her book [ In This Our Life] and mentioning that she has been ill.

did.unittitle: Ellen Glasgow to Harry Hansen 1943 Oct 28

scopecontent.p: Thanking him for his review of A Certain Measure
